channel.title: plotly on MetalBlueberry - A passionate programmer
channel.description: Recent content in plotly on MetalBlueberry - A passionate programmer

item.title: Python Jupyter Notebook With Plotly Support
item.description: Python is awesome because you can do anything. In this case, I’m going to show you how to configure a Jupyter notebook with integrated Plotly support to draw interactive graphs. This is very useful if you have to analyse something.

item.title: Add Plots With Hugo Shortcodes - Plotly
item.description: Plotly is my favourite tool to create plots for a lot of reasons. One is that you can create plots with javascript and create interactive graphs. I’m going to show you how to create a shortcode to add plots to your hugo static site.
